text: The Peugeot 306 is a car produced by Peugeot. It replaced the Peugeot 309 in early 1993 with 3 and 5-door hatchbacks. In 1994, saloon and cabriolet versions were added. It was facelifted in May 1999 with an estate version added and got another update in 2000. In April 2001, it was replaced by the Peugeot 307 although estate and cabriolet models were made until 2001. == Versions == File:Peugeot 306 016.JPG|3-door hatchback File:Peu306.jpg|5-door hatchback File:1995-1997 Peugeot 306 (N3) ST sedan 01.jpg|4-door saloon File:Peugeot 306 Cabrio front 20071007.jpg|2-door cabriolet File:De Lijn diensetauto.JPG|5-door station wagon == Engines == === Petrol === * 1.1 44 kW (60 hp) * 1.4 55 kW (75 hp) * 1.6 65 kW (88 hp) * 1.8 74 kW (101 hp) * 1.8 16V 81 kW (110 hp) * 2.0 89 kW (121 hp) * 2.0 16V 97 kW (132 hp) * 2.0 S16 112 kW (152 hp) * 2.0 GTI 120 kW (163 hp) === Diesel === * 1.8 D 43 kW (58 hp) * 1.9 D 50 kW (68 hp) and 51 kW (69 hp) * 1.9 SD 55 kW (75 hp) * 1.9 TD 66 kW (90 hp) * 2.0 HDi 66 kW (90 hp) 306 Category:1990s automobiles Category:2000s automobiles
title: Peugeot 306
